archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0640
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to integrate device AR into the device selection journey to provide customers with an enhanced shopping experience

properties.value: AR could be tricky (VF to investigate internally), but Comarch can offer integration with external partner who delivers 3D models of devices (Binkies3D). VF to investigate possible partners.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
